verses.verse: Then Samuel <WH8050> took <WH3947> a vial <WH6378> of oil <WH8081>, and poured <WH3332> it upon his head <WH7218>, and kissed <WH5401> him <WH559>, and said, Is it not because the Lord <WH3068> has anointed <WH4886> you to be captain <WH5057> over his inheritance <WH5159>?

When you are departed <WH3212> from me <WH5978> to day <WH3117>, then you shall find <WH4672> two <WH8147> men <WH582> by Rachel <WH7354>'s tomb <WH6900> in the border <WH1366> of Benjamin <WH1144> at Zelzah <WH6766>; and they will say <WH559> unto you <WH860>, The donkeys which you went <WH1980> to seek <WH1245> are found <WH4672>: and <WH1>, behold, your father has left <WH5203> the care <WH1697> of the donkeys <WH860>, and sorrows <WH1672> for you <WH559>, saying, What shall I do <WH6213> for my son <WH1121>?

Then shall you go on <WH2498> forward <WH1973> from there <WH935>, and you shall come to the plain <WH436> of Tabor <WH8396>, and there shall meet <WH4672> you three <WH7969> men <WH582> going up <WH5927> to God <WH430> to Beth <WH1008>â€“el, one <WH259> carrying <WH5375> three <WH7969> kids <WH1423>, and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> three <WH7969> loaves <WH3603> of bread <WH3899>, and another <WH259> carrying <WH5375> a bottle <WH5035> of wine <WH3196>:
And they will <WH7592> greet <WH7965> you <WH5414>, and give you two <WH8147> loaves of bread <WH3899>; which you shall receive <WH3947> of their hands <WH3027>.

After <WH310> that you shall come <WH935> to the hill <WH1389> of God <WH430>, where is the garrison <WH5333> of the Philistines <WH6430>: and it shall come to pass <WH935>, when you are come there to the city <WH5892>, that you shall meet <WH6293> a company <WH2256> of prophets <WH5030> coming down <WH3381> from the high place <WH1116> with a psaltery <WH5035>, and a tambourine <WH8596>, and a pipe <WH2485>, and a harp <WH3658>, before <WH6440> them <WH5012>; and they shall prophesy:
And the Spirit <WH7307> of the Lord <WH3068> will come <WH6743> upon you <WH5012>, and you shall prophesy with them <WH2015>, and shall be turned into another <WH312> man <WH376>.
And let it be <WH226>, when these signs are come <WH935> unto you <WH6213>, that you do as occasion <WH4672> serve <WH3027> you <WH430>; for God is with you.

And you shall go down <WH3381> before <WH6440> me to Gilgal <WH1537>; and <WH3381>, behold, I will come down unto you <WH5927>, to offer burnt offerings <WH5930>, and to sacrifice <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall you stay <WH3176>, until I come <WH935> to you <WH3045>, and show you what you shall do <WH6213>.

And it was so <WH6437>, that when he had turned his back <WH7926> to go <WH3212> from Samuel <WH8050>, God <WH430> gave <WH2015> him another <WH312> heart <WH3820>: and all those signs <WH226> came <WH935> to pass that day <WH3117>.

And when they came <WH935> there to the hill <WH1389>, behold <WH2256>, a company of prophets <WH5030> met <WH7125> him <WH7307>; and the Spirit of God <WH430> came <WH6743> upon him <WH5012>, and he prophesied among them <WH8432>.

And it came to pass <WH3045>, when all that knew him previously <WH865> saw <WH7200> that <WH5012>, behold, he prophesied among the prophets <WH5030>, then the people <WH5971> said <WH559> one <WH376> to another <WH7453>, What is this that is come unto the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027>? Is Saul <WH7586> also among the prophets <WH5030>?
And one <WH376> of the same place answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, But who is their father <WH1>? Therefore it became a proverb <WH4912>, Is Saul <WH7586> also among the prophets <WH5030>?
And when he had made an end <WH3615> of prophesying <WH5012>, he came <WH935> to the high place <WH1116>.

And Saul <WH7586>'s uncle <WH1730> said <WH559> unto him and to his servant <WH5288>, Where <WH575> went <WH1980> you <WH559>? And he said, To seek <WH1245> the donkeys <WH860>: and when we saw <WH7200> that they were no where <WH369>, we came <WH935> to Samuel <WH8050>.
And Saul <WH7586>'s uncle <WH1730> said <WH559>, Tell <WH5046> me <WH8050>, I pray you, what Samuel said unto you <WH559>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> unto his uncle <WH1730>, He told <WH5046> us plainly <WH5046> that the donkeys <WH860> were found <WH4672>. But of the matter <WH1697> of the kingdom <WH4410>, whereof Samuel <WH8050> spoke <WH559>, he told him not <WH5046>.
And Samuel <WH8050> called <WH6817> the people <WH5971> together unto the Lord <WH3068> to Mizpeh <WH4709>;

And said <WH559> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, I brought up <WH5927> Israel <WH3478> out of Egypt <WH4714>, and delivered <WH5337> you out of the hand <WH3027> of the Egyptians <WH4714>, and out of the hand <WH3027> of all kingdoms <WH4467>, and of them that oppressed you <WH3905>:

And you have this day <WH3117> rejected <WH3988> your God <WH430>, who himself saved <WH3467> you out of all your adversities <WH7451> and your tribulations <WH6869>; and you have said <WH559> unto him <WH7760>, No, but set a king <WH4428> over us <WH3320>. Now therefore present yourselves before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> by your tribes <WH7626>, and by your thousands <WH505>.
And when Samuel <WH8050> had caused all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to come near <WH7126>, the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144> was taken <WH3920>.

When he had caused the tribe <WH7626> of Benjamin <WH1144> to come near <WH7126> by their families <WH4940>, the family <WH4940> of Matri <WH4309> was taken <WH3920>, and Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish <WH7027> was taken <WH3920>: and when they sought <WH1245> him <WH4672>, he could not be found.

Therefore they inquired <WH7592> of the Lord <WH3068> further <WH376>, if the man should yet come <WH935> there <WH1988>. And the Lord <WH3068> answered <WH559>, Behold <WH2244>, he has hid himself among the stuff <WH3627>.

And they ran <WH7323> and fetched <WH3947> him there <WH3320>: and when he stood among <WH8432> the people <WH5971>, he was higher <WH1361> than any of the people <WH5971> from his shoulders <WH7926> and upward <WH4605>.

And Samuel <WH8050> said <WH559> to all the people <WH5971>, See <WH7200> you him whom the Lord <WH3068> has chosen <WH977>, that there is none like him among all the people <WH5971>? And all the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321>, and said <WH559>, God save <WH2421> the king <WH4428>.

Then Samuel <WH8050> told <WH1696> the people <WH5971> the manner <WH4941> of the kingdom <WH4410>, and wrote <WH3789> it in a book <WH5612>, and laid it up <WH3240> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>. And Samuel <WH8050> sent <WH7971> all the people <WH5971> away <WH7971>, every man <WH376> to his house <WH1004>.
And Saul <WH7586> also went <WH1980> home <WH1004> to Gibeah <WH1390>; and there went <WH3212> with him a band of men <WH2428>, whose hearts <WH3820> God <WH430> had touched <WH5060>.

But the sons <WH1121> of Belial <WH1100> said <WH559>, How shall this man save <WH3467> us <WH959>? And they despised him <WH935>, and brought him no presents <WH4503>. But he held his peace <WH2790>.
